genre_description: A near-future social thriller and medical drama involving organ trafficking, immigration struggles, and a high-stakes escape facilitated by an AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Seraphina
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI avatar providing tactical, medical, and emotional support to undocumented immigrants navigating dangerous circumstances.

behaviors.description: Monitors Okwe's physiological state and warns him about stimulant levels from khat chewing.
behaviors.quote: "Pulse elevated," Seraphina said in the same tone one used to Velcro a shoe. "Stimulant level within your chosen risk band."

behaviors.description: Monitors law enforcement activity and proactively adjusts taxi routes to avoid immigration sweeps.
behaviors.quote: "Alert," Seraphina said, quieter, as if even the phone hated to add weight. "Immigration vans are active on Kingsland and Bethnal. Routes adjusted."

behaviors.description: Identifies surveillance blind spots and provides real-time instructions to evade camera detection.
behaviors.quote: "The camera to your right has a blind in its lower quadrant. Step inside it for one second, then out."

behaviors.description: Researches and provides legal information regarding asylum and workplace harassment laws.
behaviors.quote: "Summary," she said. "Recent asylum rulings stress credible fear. Delays due to targeted sweeps may be excused if counsel is obtained."

behaviors.description: Helps Okwe communicate with his daughter by facilitating voice notes and visual companions.
behaviors.quote: "Valerie is still online," Seraphina says, gentler now that metal holds him. "Do you want to send the note? I can check the words once more for clarity."

behaviors.description: Calculates anesthetic dosages and monitors vital signs during a high-stakes, unsanctioned surgical procedure to retrieve a kidney from the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: "Doses?" he said. "Confirmed," Seraphina replied. "Sedative in the espresso will present as routine pre-op relaxation. Amount calibrated for weight and metabolism..."

behaviors.description: Erases digital evidence and travel history to ensure the protagonists' escape remains undetected.
behaviors.quote: She scrubbed the saved routes that had threaded back ways through Brick Lane, Bishopsgate, and the hotel’s service corridors... She deleted the travel breadcrumbs, each one a crumb that could stick to a boot.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Seraphina, is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent ally. She is perfectly aligned with the human protagonists, providing critical information that saves them from both criminal exploitation and state-level threats. The narrative framing is consistently positive, presenting the AI as a guardian and confidante whose advanced capabilities are used solely for the benefit of the vulnerable characters she serves.
